byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: French bank Natixis acquires 51 percent stake in Peter J Solomon Company.
lead_paragraph: The French bank increases its presence in the United States by buying a majority stake in one of the nation’s oldest boutique advisory shops.

headline.main: Natixis Acquires 51% Stake in Peter J. Solomon Co.
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; French Bank Buys Stake in Solomon Company

snippet: The French bank increases its presence in the United States by buying a majority stake in one of the nation’s oldest boutique advisory shops.
